thread.title: BRIEF-National Finance Updates On Proposed Merger With Oman Orix Leasing

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-National Finance Updates On Proposed Merger With Oman Orix Leasing
text:
March 11 (Reuters) - NATIONAL FINANCE CO:
* UPDATES ON PROPOSED MERGER WITH OMAN ORIX LEASING COMPANY
* CASH CONSIDERATION FOR EACH SHARE OF OOLC, ITS SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE 0.190 RIAL PER SHARE‍​
* FOR EACH SHARE OF OOLC, ITS SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE 0.9029 SHARE OF THE COMPANY
* CO PROPOSES TO PAY THE CASH CONSIDERATION AND ISSUE THE NEW SHARES BY MARCH 21, 2018 Source:( bit.ly/2FwE3Cf ) Further company coverage:
